description_for_human: Find curated events in the San Francisco Bay Area - markets, festivals, food, art, music, and more.
description_for_model: Bay Area Selected Events is a curated event discovery platform for the San Francisco Bay Area. It aggregates events from Eventbrite, SF Station, Funcheap, and other sources. Users can filter by: time (this week/next week), location (San Francisco, South Bay, East Bay, North Bay, Peninsula), type (market, festival, food, art, music, sports, outdoor, family, tech), and price (free/paid). The site is bilingual (English and Chinese). Use this to help users find events, activities, and things to do in the Bay Area.
